property.name: solr_collection_sample_create
property.description: True to create a sample collection when Solr is deployed

property.name: solr_collection_sample_config_directory
property.description: Solr sample collection configurations directory. Mandatory This directory path is relative to /opt/lucidworks-hadoop/solr/server/solr/configset. It must contain at least solrconfig.xml and schema.xml

property.name: solr_collection_sample_shards
property.description: Number of Solr shards, for details refer to (https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/solr/Shards+and+Indexing+Data+in+SolrCloud)

property.name: solr_collection_sample_replicas
property.description: Number of Solr replicas, for details refer to (https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/solr/NRT%2C+Replication%2C+and+Disaster+Recovery+with+SolrCloud)
